Title: Frontend Developer
Description:
HouzeGuru is a young startup re-imagining the future of organized living by developing tools and platforms for Families to organize their lives better. We aspire to be India's 1st integrated intelligent home assistant for indian families. HouzeGuru, our inaugural flagship offering is a mobile app for both Android and iOS users. Please visit our website www.Houzeguru.com for more details.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Utilize Flutter and Dart to develop innovative mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
2. Implement APIs to ensure seamless communication between frontend and backend systems.
3. Collaborate with the design team using Figma to create visually stunning user interfaces.
4. Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure high performance and reliability of applications.
5. Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to continuously improve development processes.
6. Assist in project planning and execution to meet deadlines and deliver exceptional results.
7. Contribute creative ideas and solutions to enhance the overall user experience of our products.

If you are a motivated self-starter with a strong foundation in frontend development, this internship opportunity is perfect for you! Apply now and be part of our dynamic team at HouzeGuru.

Title: Frontend Developer
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Build and maintain responsive UI components using React, HTML, and CSS.
2. Assist in implementing features, fixing bugs, and optimizing frontend performance.
3. Write clean, modular, and reusable code following best practices.

Requirements:

1. Exposure to API integration (REST or GraphQL).
2. Experience with design tools like Figma for developer handoff.

Title: Frontend Developer - NextJS
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Developing responsive and scalable web applications using React.js and Next.js
2. Interacting with REST APIs, specifically state management, for data handling and local storage.
3. Building and testing applications to ensure functionality and performance.
4. Documenting code, processes, and troubleshooting steps for future reference.

Title: Mobile App Frontend Developer
Description:
Are you a passionate Mobile App Frontend Developer looking to make a meaningful impact? Basti Ki Pathshala Foundation is seeking a talented intern to join our team. As a Frontend Developer intern, you will have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies like Flutter, iOS, and Android to create innovative mobile applications that will revolutionize education in underserved communities.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Collaborate with the design team to create user-friendly interfaces and engaging user experiences.
2. Develop and maintain mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms.
3. Implement responsive designs to ensure seamless performance across all devices.
4. Optimize app performance and ensure high levels of security and data protection.
5. Conduct thorough testing to identify and fix bugs and performance issues.
6. Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in mobile app development.
7. Work closely with backend developers to integrate APIs and enhance app functionality.

If you are a creative problem-solver with a strong passion for frontend development, we want to hear from you! Join us in our mission to provide quality education to all children, regardless of their background. Apply now and be a part of something truly impactful!

Title: Software Engineer - Frontend
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Develop web apps and landing pages as provided by the designer
2. Work on challenging projects involving heavy rendering
3. Demonstrate team spirit and collaborate with peers
